title: How to Draw a Custom Car

steps.headline: Draw the basic outline of the car.
Draw the lower part which includes the wheel space and the bumpers.
Add wheels to the car.
steps.description: You can draw the rims from your own creativity.

steps.headline: Draw the spoiler.
steps.description: It can be a little tricky to draw at first but you can always draw a simpler one.

steps.headline: Give the car some decals.
steps.description: Now this is where you put the spirit in the car. Add flames at the bottom, add a car number, detail the roof and shade some parts such as the rims or windows.

steps.headline: Add a carburetor to the hood of the car

text: Draw the basic outline of the car.  Draw the lower part which includes the wheel space and the bumpers.  Add wheels to the car. You can draw the rims from your own creativity. Add headlights and rear lights. Also detail them. Draw the spoiler. It can be a little tricky to draw at first but you can always draw a simpler one. Give the car some decals. Now this is where you put the spirit in the car. Add flames at the bottom, add a car number, detail the roof and shade some parts such as the rims or windows. Add a carburetor to the hood of the car  Finished.
